admin_password.description: The password for the default ADMIN user.

autonomous_database_id.description: The ID of the Autonomous Database to create. This value is restricted to (^[a-z]([a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9])?$) and must be a maximum of 63 characters in length. The value must start with a letter and end with a letter or a number.

cidr.description: The subnet CIDR range for the Autonmous Database.

create_time.description: The date and time that the Autonomous Database was created.

database.description: The name of the Autonomous Database. The database name must be unique in the project. The name must begin with a letter and can contain a maximum of 30 alphanumeric characters.

deletion_protection.description: Whether or not to allow Terraform to destroy the instance. Unless this field is set to false in Terraform state, a terraform destroy or terraform apply that would delete the instance will fail.

display_name.description: The display name for the Autonomous Database. The name does not have to be unique within your project.

effective_labels.description: All of labels (key/value pairs) present on the resource in GCP, including the labels configured through Terraform, other clients and services.

entitlement_id.description: The ID of the subscription entitlement associated with the Autonomous Database.

labels.description: The labels or tags associated with the Autonomous Database. **Note**: This field is non-authoritative, and will only manage the labels present in your configuration. Please refer to the field 'effective_labels' for all of the labels present on the resource.

location.description: Resource ID segment making up resource 'name'. See documentation for resource type 'oracledatabase.googleapis.com/AutonomousDatabaseBackup'.

name.description: Identifier. The name of the Autonomous Database resource in the following format: projects/{project}/locations/{region}/autonomousDatabases/{autonomous_database}

network.description: The name of the VPC network used by the Autonomous Database. Format: projects/{project}/global/networks/{network}

odb_network.description: The name of the OdbNetwork associated with the Autonomous Database. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/odbNetworks/{odb_network} It is optional but if specified, this should match the parent ODBNetwork of the odb_subnet and backup_odb_subnet.

odb_subnet.description: The name of the OdbSubnet associated with the Autonomous Database for IP allocation. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/odbNetworks/{odb_network}/odbSubnets/{odb_subnet}

terraform_labels.description: The combination of labels configured directly on the resource and default labels configured on the provider.

actual_used_data_storage_size_tb.description: The amount of storage currently being used for user and system data, in terabytes.

allocated_storage_size_tb.description: The amount of storage currently allocated for the database tables and billed for, rounded up in terabytes.

are_primary_allowlisted_ips_used.description: This field indicates the status of Data Guard and Access control for the Autonomous Database. The field's value is null if Data Guard is disabled or Access Control is disabled. The field's value is TRUE if both Data Guard and Access Control are enabled, and the Autonomous Database is using primary IP access control list (ACL) for standby. The field's value is FALSE if both Data Guard and Access Control are enabled, and the Autonomous Database is using a different IP access control list (ACL) for standby compared to primary.

available_upgrade_versions.description: The list of available Oracle Database upgrade versions for an Autonomous Database.

backup_retention_period_days.description: The retention period for the Autonomous Database. This field is specified in days, can range from 1 day to 60 days, and has a default value of 60 days.

character_set.description: The character set for the Autonomous Database. The default is AL32UTF8.

compute_count.description: The number of compute servers for the Autonomous Database.

connection_strings.description: The connection string used to connect to the Autonomous Database. https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/api/#/en/database/20160918/datatypes/AutonomousDatabaseConnectionStrings

connection_urls.description: The URLs for accessing Oracle Application Express (APEX) and SQL Developer Web with a browser from a Compute instance. https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/api/#/en/database/20160918/datatypes/AutonomousDatabaseConnectionUrls

data_safe_state.description: The current state of the Data Safe registration for the Autonomous Database. Possible values: DATA_SAFE_STATE_UNSPECIFIED REGISTERING REGISTERED DEREGISTERING NOT_REGISTERED FAILED

data_storage_size_gb.description: The size of the data stored in the database, in gigabytes.

data_storage_size_tb.description: The size of the data stored in the database, in terabytes.

database_management_state.description: The current state of database management for the Autonomous Database. Possible values: DATABASE_MANAGEMENT_STATE_UNSPECIFIED ENABLING ENABLED DISABLING NOT_ENABLED FAILED_ENABLING FAILED_DISABLING

db_edition.description: The edition of the Autonomous Databases. Possible values: DATABASE_EDITION_UNSPECIFIED STANDARD_EDITION ENTERPRISE_EDITION

db_version.description: The Oracle Database version for the Autonomous Database.

db_workload.description: Possible values: DB_WORKLOAD_UNSPECIFIED OLTP DW AJD APEX

failed_data_recovery_duration.description: This field indicates the number of seconds of data loss during a Data Guard failover.

is_auto_scaling_enabled.description: This field indicates if auto scaling is enabled for the Autonomous Database CPU core count.

is_local_data_guard_enabled.description: This field indicates whether the Autonomous Database has local (in-region) Data Guard enabled.

is_storage_auto_scaling_enabled.description: This field indicates if auto scaling is enabled for the Autonomous Database storage.

license_type.description: The license type used for the Autonomous Database. Possible values: LICENSE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED LICENSE_INCLUDED BRING_YOUR_OWN_LICENSE

lifecycle_details.description: The details of the current lifestyle state of the Autonomous Database.

local_adg_auto_failover_max_data_loss_li.description: This field indicates the maximum data loss limit for an Autonomous Database, in seconds.

local_disaster_recovery_type.description: This field indicates the local disaster recovery (DR) type of an Autonomous Database. Possible values: LOCAL_DISASTER_RECOVERY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED ADG BACKUP_BASED

local_standby_db.description: Autonomous Data Guard standby database details. https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/api/#/en/database/20160918/datatypes/AutonomousDatabaseStandbySummary

maintenance_begin_time.description: The date and time when maintenance will begin.

maintenance_end_time.description: The date and time when maintenance will end.

maintenance_schedule_type.description: The maintenance schedule of the Autonomous Database. Possible values: MAINTENANCE_SCHEDULE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED EARLY REGULAR

memory_per_oracle_compute_unit_gbs.description: The amount of memory enabled per ECPU, in gigabytes.

memory_table_gbs.description: The memory assigned to in-memory tables in an Autonomous Database.

mtls_connection_required.description: This field specifies if the Autonomous Database requires mTLS connections.

n_character_set.description: The national character set for the Autonomous Database. The default is AL16UTF16.

next_long_term_backup_time.description: The long term backup schedule of the Autonomous Database.

oci_url.description: The Oracle Cloud Infrastructure link for the Autonomous Database.

open_mode.description: This field indicates the current mode of the Autonomous Database. Possible values: OPEN_MODE_UNSPECIFIED READ_ONLY READ_WRITE

operations_insights_state.description: Possible values: OPERATIONS_INSIGHTS_STATE_UNSPECIFIED ENABLING ENABLED DISABLING NOT_ENABLED FAILED_ENABLING FAILED_DISABLING

peer_db_ids.description: The list of OCIDs of standby databases located in Autonomous Data Guard remote regions that are associated with the source database.

permission_level.description: The permission level of the Autonomous Database. Possible values: PERMISSION_LEVEL_UNSPECIFIED RESTRICTED UNRESTRICTED

private_endpoint.description: The private endpoint for the Autonomous Database.

private_endpoint_ip.description: The private endpoint IP address for the Autonomous Database.

private_endpoint_label.description: The private endpoint label for the Autonomous Database.

refreshable_mode.description: The refresh mode of the cloned Autonomous Database. Possible values: REFRESHABLE_MODE_UNSPECIFIED AUTOMATIC MANUAL

refreshable_state.description: The refresh State of the clone. Possible values: REFRESHABLE_STATE_UNSPECIFIED REFRESHING NOT_REFRESHING

role.description: The Data Guard role of the Autonomous Database. Possible values: ROLE_UNSPECIFIED PRIMARY STANDBY DISABLED_STANDBY BACKUP_COPY SNAPSHOT_STANDBY

scheduled_operation_details.description: The list and details of the scheduled operations of the Autonomous Database.

sql_web_developer_url.description: The SQL Web Developer URL for the Autonomous Database.

state.description: Possible values: STATE_UNSPECIFIED PROVISIONING AVAILABLE STOPPING STOPPED STARTING TERMINATING TERMINATED UNAVAILABLE RESTORE_IN_PROGRESS RESTORE_FAILED BACKUP_IN_PROGRESS SCALE_IN_PROGRESS AVAILABLE_NEEDS_ATTENTION UPDATING MAINTENANCE_IN_PROGRESS RESTARTING RECREATING ROLE_CHANGE_IN_PROGRESS UPGRADING INACCESSIBLE STANDBY

supported_clone_regions.description: The list of available regions that can be used to create a clone for the Autonomous Database.

total_auto_backup_storage_size_gbs.description: The storage space used by automatic backups of Autonomous Database, in gigabytes.

used_data_storage_size_tbs.description: The storage space used by Autonomous Database, in gigabytes.

email.description: The email address used by Oracle to send notifications regarding databases and infrastructure.

block.description: The properties of an Autonomous Database.
